meanings.definition: The state of being excessively fat or overweight.
meanings.sent1: Her corpulencies made it difficult for her to fit into the small chair.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised him to exercise regularly to reduce his corpulencies.
meanings.sent3: Despite her corpulencies, she always had a smile on her face.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the corpulencies of the Thanksgiving feast.
meanings.sent5: His corpulencies were so noticeable that even strangers would comment on them.

meanings.sent1: The extravagant mansion was decorated with corpulencies of gold and jewels.
meanings.sent2: She found his corpulencies in spending money on unnecessary items quite frustrating.
meanings.sent3: The cake was topped with corpulencies of frosting that made it almost too sweet to eat.
meanings.sent4: The movie exaggerated the corpulencies of the villain to make him appear more menacing.
meanings.sent5: The garden was overgrown with corpulencies of plants, creating a wild and untamed look.
